page.title: 07Parents'Occupations,Kinbrace
page.content: The homes of most of the children who attend our school are many kilometres from Kinbrace. Glen and Calum's father works for Fountain Forestry a private forestry firm and looks after forty workers who live in caravans. Sometimes he uses a helicopter for his work. Their Mum writes stories for magazines. She also Knits Arran woollens and sells them. Corran's parents are hoteliers. Their guests fish for trout and shoot grouse and deer. My parents also have an hotel. Tamara and Andrew's Dad is a waterbailiff. Their Mum cooks in a shooting guest house and is known to have served royalty. Kirsteen's Dad is a handyman on a nearby estate. Jodie comes from Birmingham and her father is a gardener on Kildonan Estate. Gordon's father is a postman,a snow plough driver and a car mechanic.
